title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs & embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and reactive streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama REST API with fuzzy-find model picker and chat REPL.

title: chatbox
summary: Cross-platform desktop chat client that supports Ollama, OpenAI, Claude; local data storage.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of Retrieval-Augmented Generation using Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with decorators for chat & embeddings.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama sidecar containers for CI pipelines needing local LLMs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST endpoints using reqwest & tokio.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles for CodeLlama, Phi-2, Zephyr, etc.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds “Ask Ollama” command for locally assisted note-writing.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that bridges channels or DMs to Ollama with rate-limiting and audit logs.
